authority_boundary.scope: Automated content moderation for user-generated posts; flag or hide only
authority_boundary.maximum_impact: Single post hidden from feed; user can appeal
authority_boundary.escalation_trigger: High-confidence policy violation or user appeal

ambiguity_handling.why_this_placement: Content moderation decisions that affect users must have human review when unclear.
ambiguity_handling.what_happens_while_waiting: Post remains visible; queued for human review

contest_path.how_to_contest: Appeal via in-app form with optional explanation

reversibility_plan.safe_stop: Disable auto-hide; all new flags route to human queue only

undo_strategy.details: Restore post visibility and clear flag; notify user of appeal outcome

runaway_guardrails: Max 100 actions per minute per moderator

partial_action_states.what_requires_compensation: If post was already hidden and seen by fewer users

plain_language.what_happened: Post P-123 flagged and hidden for policy violation
plain_language.why: Classifier matched policy category; confidence above threshold
plain_language.how_to_challenge: Submit appeal in app within 30 days
plain_language.how_to_undo_or_stop: Moderator can restore and clear flag

ownership_and_escalation.escalation_rule: Appeal volume spike or classifier error rate above 10%
ownership_and_escalation.on_call_expectation: Review appeals within 24h; escalate to policy if needed
ownership_and_escalation.audit_cadence: Weekly review of appeals and overturns
